column4: When I scan for drivers, it tells me "No proprietary drivers are in use on this system."
personally, drobole, I use chatzilla which is an addon for firefox
I find it more extensible than Xchat
There is a server and client versions, if I'm not mistaken
if you want something simple to use, use Xchat
Isn't there a GUI ftp server for linux?
I guess he's asking for people's favorites
How to use pure-ftpd? I dont understand the documentation and when I access it, no files show up when it says its supposed to show my home
Filezilla has a server, but it's for windows only
It says the server is windows only
